message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget considerations, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $11,500 is still a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to go up to $10,500. Can we meet at that price?
